replies.body: Did this only happen once, or are you seeing this happen often?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3MMnHXpg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-21T23:30:43.892+0000)
>
> Did this only happen once, or are you seeing this happen often?

This is happening quite frequently across all my accounts. My internet isnt even spiking i checked a chart recently while i got it and reconnected mid champion select... Its entirely league of legends client itself and not my network.

It sounds like your connection may have problems along the way to the server. This may also be a root cause as to why your League files are being corrupted. As a first step, I suggest working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which will verify your local network settings are up to spec.

Let me know if you still see issues after taking those steps.
